Project Title: An Open-Label, Randomized Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Enfortumab Vedotin vs Chemotherapy in Subjects with Previously Treated Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial Cancer (EV-301)
Study Title: An Open-Label, Randomized Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Enfortumab Vedotin vs Chemotherapy in Subjects with Previously Treated Locally Advanced or Metastatic Urothelial Cancer (EV-301)
Indication: Locally advanced or metastatic urothelial cancer
Duration of Treatment: 28-day cycle for Arm A and 21-day cycle for Arm B

questionnaires.questionnaireSchedule: Baseline (Day -7 to -1), Day 1 of each week for first 12 weeks, then every 12 weeks, EOT and follow-up visit
questionnaireTiming: Base Date   (Visit  ): Date of Last Dose   (End of Treatment1  )
Base Date   (Visit  ): Date of last Dose + 30 days   (Follow-up2  )
